short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crunchyroll Comments is a browser extension that brings back the Crunchyroll comments section.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you missing the comment section on Crunchyroll? Crunchy Comments is here to revive the community experience by providing a seamless, open-source, and self-hosted comment section powered by Comentario. Engage with fellow anime fans and share your thoughts without any of the drawbacks.

Key Features:

Privacy First: No tracking scripts, pixels, or ads. Only high-level statistics like country, browser, and language are collected.
Flexible Login Options: Comment without registration or use local authentication and popular social logins including Twitter/X, and GitHub.
Hierarchical Comments: Reply to comments, creating nested threads for structured discussions.
Markdown Formatting: Enhance your comments with bold, italic, strikethrough, links, images, tables, code blocks, and more.
Thread Locking: Moderators can disable commenting on specific pages or freeze entire domains.
Spoiler: Use || to surround text and mark them as spoiler.
Timestamp Seeking: You can now seek a timestamp after clicking on a timestamp in comments.
